ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.latex

Class LatexCleaner

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.TextCleaner
      • ca.uqac.lif.textidote.cleaning.latex.LatexCleaner

  • public class LatexCleaner
extends TextCleaner
    Removes LaTeX markup from an input string, and generates an annotated string in return.
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String IGNORE_BEGIN
      The string to look for to tell TeXtidote to start ignoring lines
      static java.lang.String IGNORE_END
      The string to look for to tell TeXtidote to stop ignoring lines
      protected java.util.Set<java.lang.String> m_environmentsToIgnore
      A set of additional environment names to remove when cleaning up
      protected boolean m_ignoreBeforeDocument
      Whether the detexer will remove all lines before seeing \begin{document}
      protected static java.util.regex.Pattern m_includePattern
      A regex pattern matching the input and include declarations in a line of markup.
      protected java.util.List<java.lang.String> m_innerFiles
      A list of non-commented input and include declarations found in the file to be cleaned.

      • setIgnoreBeforeDocument

        public LatexCleaner setIgnoreBeforeDocument(boolean b)
        Sets whether the detexer will remove all lines before seeing \begin{document}, without even attempting to interpret them
        Parameters:
        b - Set to true to remove the lines (the default), false otherwise
        Returns:
        This detexer

      • fetchIncludes

        protected void fetchIncludes(AnnotatedString as)
        Populates a list of non-commented input and include declarations found in the file to be cleaned.
        Parameters:
        as - The contents of the file (where environments and comments have already been removed).

      • getInnerFiles

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getInnerFiles()
        Returns the list of non-commented input and include declarations found in the file to be cleaned. This result will be non-empty only after clean() has been called.
        Specified by:
        getInnerFiles in class TextCleaner
        Returns:
        The list of filenames
